title: Less than unanimous verdict authorized
context: §635-20 Less than unanimous verdict authorized. In all civil cases tried before a jury it shall be sufficient for the return of a verdict if at least five-sixths of the jurors agree on the verdict. [L 1965, c 171, §1; Supp, §231-28; HRS §635-20] Cross References Trial by jury, see Const. art. I, §13. Rules of Court See HRCP rule 48.
